at.ac.tuwien.ims.towardsthelight

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.ac.tuwien.ims.towardsthelight.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores information about the player character.
    Author:
    Felix Kugler

    • Field Summary

      • BASE_ACCELERATION

        public static final float BASE_ACCELERATION
        Acceleration without boost. This defines how quickly the player reaches BASE_VELOCITY_Y after the start of the game or a collision.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        Time the player is invincible after a collision.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • x

        public float x
        X position of the player.

      • y

        public float y
        Y position of the player. Since the vertical position of the player is fixed this is the inverse Y position of the level.

      • velocityY

        public float velocityY
        Player velocity on Y axis.

      • score

        public int score
        Number of collectibles that have been collected.

        Number of lives the player has left.
